## Create a Config object

Settings for a CAMDAC pipeline are stored in a `CamConfig` object. For example, to run CAMDAC on hg38 with 10 cores:
  
```{r create_config}
library(CAMDAC)
config <- CamConfig() 
```

## Create Sample objects

The CAMDAC pipeline accepts `CamSample` objects representing each sample involved in deconvolution.
